https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Texas_v._Johnson

什麼？一個相信共產主義的傻X在美國燒美國國旗都不犯法？well，最高法院是這樣判的。

Government cannot mandate by fiat a feeling of unity in its citizens. Therefore that very same government cannot carve out a symbol of unity and prescribe a set of approved messages to be associated with that symbol.


Happy Independence Day~ 自然不建議燒毀🇺🇸來慶祝，但是知道就算去到燒旗也是公民的自由，可以被國家公權力機關寬容，那或許是一件可以值得用來慶祝July the 4th的事。
